留言內容: I bought this for a function that didn't happen so I chucked it into the closet. When I finally tried it on, I was surprised to find how comfortable it was. It doesn't wrinkle. It is just long enough to skim my hips. (I'm 5'6") It's roomy enough to flow over my torso without drowning me. The shoulders don't look like a linebacker's. My only wish is that the designers of plus-size women's clothing would be that they would give us long sleeves. So many shirts sport 3/4 sleeves. Just a wish. These sleeves are 3/4 with a tab and look nice. It's a very pretty shirt.

商品名稱: Zattcas 女款花卉印花長身襯衫 七分袖缺口領口束腰上衣

留言內容: Nice material. Made well.  Appropriate for office. Sleeves and shirt length are correct for the size you buy.  Washes well.  I bought Purple and returned to buy the navy and green.

商品名稱: Zattcas 女款花卉印花長身襯衫 七分袖缺口領口束腰上衣
SKU: 尺寸: XX-Large顏色: Solid New Wine Red
留言內容: This shirt is very soft and comfortable.  I'm 5'6", 215 lbs and ordered an XXL.  I could have probably gotten away with an XL.  It's one of those shirts that seem to get bigger as the day goes on if you know what I mean.  The sleeves are buttoned 3/4 so those aren't in the way, but I wore this to an event and after about 2 hours, I felt like I was sort of swimming in the shirt.  It covers your figure well, and the drape is flattering.  The fabric is very soft, and the shirt can be worn with jeans or dressed up with slacks or a skirt, which is why I stated it's an all-occasion shirt.  I will be ordering another in XL and hope for the best.

商品名稱: Zattcas 女款花卉印花長身襯衫 七分袖缺口領口束腰上衣
SKU: 尺寸: 3X顏色: Slub Fabric Mint Leopard Print
留言內容: Different colors are made of different materials.As for the patterned tops, they're great! They cover flaws nicely, and they're cute! The material is more stiff and will not define any flaws.As for the solid colors... I am not fond of the material. They define rolls, lumps, and bumps on the torso. It you want to cover anything then the solid colors are not the tops to go for. The material is very soft and will accentuate any unevenness you may have.

商品名稱: Zattcas 女款花卉印花長身襯衫 七分袖缺口領口束腰上衣
留言內容: I didn’t like the sleeves too much. They are just ended in a cheap stitch around, without any kind of cuff.The back is a little longer than the front. This feature helps if you have a curve of your back and you want to look even. It worked for me.The material is heavy and clingy. I got a small when I usually wear extra-small, and it fit, not too big.I added a little decorations to the neckline.* I write reviews to let you know how this product was for me, and to aid you in your decision to buy or not buy.

商品名稱: Zattcas 女款花卉印花長身襯衫 七分袖缺口領口束腰上衣
SKU: 尺寸: Medium顏色: Slub Fabric--polka Dot Green
留言內容: I love this top.  It is soft and comfy.  I thought the size ran a little large.  I ordered a M which I normally get and it felt large on me.

商品名稱: Zattcas 女款花卉印花長身襯衫 七分袖缺口領口束腰上衣
SKU: 尺寸: Large顏色: Slub Fabric-- Leopard Maroon
留言內容: I actually have two of these tunics.  They are both very flattering, and look great with leggings.  I got many compliments on both shirts.  I have one with the slubbed fabric(leopard maroon) and one with the satiny fabric (polka dot burgundy).  I really like the slubbed fabric - it doesn't wrinkle much, and needed no ironing..  The satiny one, however, shows every little wrinkle, and required quite a bit of ironing.  I plan on buying more of these tunics, but will stick with the slubbed fabric.  Much easier to care for.As for sizing, I am about 5' tall, with a 38C chest, and portly in the hip/behind.  For both shirts, the large fit me perfectly.  No binding in the chest, and flatteringly loose over the leggings.  Definitely worth the money, and will purchase again.

商品名稱: Zattcas 女款花卉印花長身襯衫 七分袖缺口領口束腰上衣
SKU: 尺寸: X-Large顏色: Solid Black
留言內容: I am 5' tall and 180 pounds with a 42 bust. I purchased this shirt in black and in green.  I bought the black in XL.  I like the slightly loose fit of the XL and the length which hits me almost mid thigh.  I love the neck line which is very flattering and the length flatters my hips.  The Large fits as well.  It sits at my shoulders better than the XL, but I notice the back shoulder seam when I move my arms.  The large accommodates my bust line well.  The length of the large is quite a bit shorter, but the back still covers my bum.The solid colors are 95% cotton and 5% spandex, but a very light fabric, but not so thin that you can see through it.  I have not washed either shirt yet, but plan to do so on delicate cycle.  I will update if they wash poorly.I wish there were more color choices in the cotton fabric as I hate polyesters against my skin.

商品名稱: Zattcas 女款花卉印花長身襯衫 七分袖缺口領口束腰上衣
SKU: 尺寸: X-Large顏色: Slub Fabric--black
留言內容: I am 5'6" and weight 170 lbs. with slightly bigger bum, and bought XL.  They fit PERFECT!  These tops are the most flattering tops I have ever owned.  They must be because I bought 7 of them.  The colors are vibrant and beautiful -  really, very beautiful.  MOST bold prints are not attractive, but these are.  I went through all the different prints and according to my skin coloring I bought almost everything that would look good on me.  A few were out of stock in my size, so I'll go back later and get those.  If you HATE LEGGINGS LIKE I DO AND WANT ANOTHER PANT A LITTLE MORE CLASSY, THEN the best pants to go with these tops are REKUCCI (I ordered size 18 and they fit perfect) pants sold here on Amazon, here's the link: https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B0792D8SF9/ref=ppx_yo_dt_b_asin_title_o00_s00?ie=UTF8&psc=1I bought four of those pants to go with all of the tops I purchased.  My review is under Margie Newman.A BIG THANK YOU TO ZATTCUS for daring to be bold and making it work!

留言內容: Overall this top was very nice. My biggest con against it was that it the fabric was way more stretchy and "synthetic" than I expected. Good length on the blouse as well (so you can wear low-rise pants). I also felt the arms were comfortable. I have slightly thicker arms from training, so I like a little extra space compared to the twig arms I was intended to have lol. I still need to test out washing it, but other than that it seems like I decent top.
